title: Japan Hot Spring Resort near Daisen Mountains with Onsen Spa
description:
Uncover the charm of Japan's Tottori Prefecture with a retreat to this elegant Mercure sanctuary, nestled in the lush foothills of the Daisen Mountains. Indulge in a traditional onsen bath experience at the resort's hot spring, savour regional flavours at Locavore restaurant and soak up the gorgeous mountain and ocean views.

Perfectly positioned for visits to the famed Daisen-Oki National Park and the Tottori Sand Dunes, this resort is a haven for nature lovers. Hike the verdant forest trails during summer, ski the impressive slopes during winter, and explore ancient shrines and the vibrant arts scene of the historic city of Yonago, a 30-minute drive away.
offer_address: 1647-13 Maruyama, Houki Cho, Saihaku Gun, Tottori 689-4108, Japan
